en-GB.name: Bus Times Checker
en-GB.summary: Check next buses to school and station
en-GB.description: Get real-time bus arrivals for your local stops using Transport for London data. Ask for buses to school, the station, or both directions at once.
examplePhrases: Alexa, ask Bus Times when's the next bus to school
Alexa, ask Bus Times to check station buses
Alexa, ask Bus Times to check both directions

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: Configure the stop IDs in config.py before testing. Use valid TfL stop IDs for your desired bus stops.
